timeline.bodyText:
I think this probably needs to go below the following paragraph -> the following paragraph describes the bullet point above this one.
Is it enabled using a CLI option?  It'd be good to give the changelog reader some idea of how to enable this.
timeline.author: MadelineMurray
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5,6 +5,7 @@
 ### Additions and Improvements 
 
 - New`trace_replayBlockTransactions` JSON-RPC API
+- Ability to automatically detect Docker NAT settings from inside the conainter.
